items.question: What's your privacy policy?
items.answer-2: We take your privacy very seriously. We will not and do not sell any of your information. Read all about it here.
items.the-gist: We take your privacy seriously.
items.name: What's your privacy policy?

items.question: What's the cost?
items.answer-2: Nothing, nada, zilch. Our partner program is free for you to join and we're glad to have you support our community.
items.the-gist: Nothing, nada, zilch
items.name: How much does the partner program cost?

items.question: Can I track the performance of my partnership with Hey Rebekah?
items.answer-2: We'll hook you up with a real-time data room that gives you anonymized, transparent, and real-time data. We'll also set up a real-time notification for all discount code redemptions.
items.the-gist: Yep, no problem
items.name: Can I track the performance of my partnership with Hey Rebekah?

items.question: Who reads hey Rebekah?
items.answer-2: Our target audience includes freelancers, self-employed professionals, solopreneurs, creators, and those who serve them. We also have a huge audience of digital marketing professionals who love our content.
items.the-gist: Our audience is freelancers
items.name: Who reads Hey Rebekah?

items.question: How can I ensure we maintain our brand's voice and messaging?
items.answer-2: If we're producing bespoke co-branded content similar to our sponsored content, you'll have the option of editorial pre-approval.
items.the-gist: We value your voice
items.name: How can I ensure we maintain our brand's voice and messaging?

items.question: How can I get in touch with the Hey Rebekah team for more information?
items.answer-2: Fill out the form on this page and our Community Advocate will get back to you. You may also give us a a call at (415) 727-4552 anytime.
items.the-gist: It's super simple
items.name: How can I get in touch with the Hey Rebekah team for more information?

items.question: How long does a typical partnership with Hey Rebekah last?
items.answer-2: We have a lot of great things planned. First, serving the needs of millions of freelancers via our daily newsletter. We've also got some killer technology enabled products on the way that will take things to the next level.
items.the-gist: We're in it for the long term
items.name: How long does a typical partnership with Hey Rebekah last?

items.question: How do I unsubscribe?
items.answer-2: We hate to say goodbye. You can unsubscribe using the link at the bottom of any Hey Rebekah newsletter.
items.the-gist: Do we really have to answer this?
items.name: How do I unsubscribe?

items.question: Do my referrals have an expiration date?
items.answer-2: Not at all! You can collect and redeem them whenever, forever.
items.the-gist: No!
items.name: Do my referrals have an expiration date?

items.question: Can I switch my email address?
items.answer-2: Of course!. Just scroll to the bottom of the newsletter where it says “Update your email preferences or unsubscribe here,” to switch email addresses.
items.the-gist: Easy, self-serve.
items.name: Can I switch my email address?

items.question: How many rewards can I redeem at once?
items.answer-2: With each referral, you get a step closer to the next best thing. At one time, you can redeem one reward. If you have a couple to redeem, do it in separate redemptions.
items.the-gist: If you're sandbagging your codes, we got you. Just be sure you redeem each on a separate order and you'll be golden.
items.name: How many rewards can I redeem at once?

items.question: Do you ship swag oversees?
items.answer-2: We ship worldwide and cover shipping free. We cannot however predict or cover import duties.
items.the-gist: Yes.
items.name: Do you ship swag oversees?

items.question: Can I exchange/return my reward?
items.answer-2: We produce all our swag on demand so it's not possible to return or exchange it. Except of course if there's a problem. Let us know if there's an issue and we'll process a replacement.
items.name: Can I exchange/return my reward?

items.question: Can I transfer my referral points to someone else?
items.answer-2: That’s totally up to you. You can send your promo code to anyone you like.
items.the-gist: Paying it forward is awesome.
items.name: Can I transfer my referral points?

items.question: How can I redeem my Hey Rebekah swag?
items.answer-2: When you reach a referral prize milestone, you’ll be sent an email with a unique promo code. Just follow the steps in the email to claim your reward. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.
items.the-gist: Your order will be automatically fulfilled after you confirm your shipping address.
items.name: How can I redeem my Hey Rebekah swag?

items.question: How can I check on my referrals?
items.answer-2: You’ll get an update in your inbox twice a week within our newsletter. We’ll let you know how many points you have and how many you need till the next cool thing. You may click the link in that update and bookmark it to check on your referral counts anytime.
items.the-gist: You can access the slick referral portal anytime.
items.name: How can I check on my referrals?

items.question: How does the referral program work?
items.answer-2: When you subscribe to the newsletter, you're automatically enrolled in the Hey Rebekah Referral Program. You can snag cool swag you don’t need and wouldn’t pay for. Refer a few friends, your annoying neighbor, or pay it forward for real. As you reach milestones, we'll send you an automagic redemption link to your email.
items.the-gist: Share your link, score some swag.
items.name: How does the referral program work?

items.question: Do you have any swag?
items.answer-2: We do indeed! Our swag is a part of our Hey Rebekah Referral Program. You can snag cool swag you don’t need and wouldn’t pay for. Refer a few friends, your annoying neighbor, or pay it forward for real. We’ll hook you up with some gear and VIP access to the Hey Rebekah Community.
items.the-gist: We got a lot of free gear that you'd never pay for.
items.name: Do you have any swag?

items.question: Who reads your emails?
items.answer-2: You can take a look at our public performance metrics to get more information.The long and short is, mostly freelancers, self-employed professionals, solopreneurs, creators, etc. We also have a massive community of digital marketing professionals. Of course, the folks that serve these fine people too.
items.the-gist: Not enough people, yet.
items.name: Who reads your emails?

items.question: Can I make changes to my sponsorship?
items.answer-2: We'll do everything we can to accommodate you. Just write to us and let us know what’s on your mind.
items.the-gist: Drop us a line, it'll be fine.
items.name: Can I make changes to my sponsorship?

items.question: How do I partner with Hey Rebekah?
items.answer-2: You’re making us blush. If you think we’d be a good match, write us and if it looks like a good fit, we’ll get back to you.
items.the-gist: Aww shucks.
items.name: How do I partner with Hey Rebekah?

items.question: What's the vision for Hey Rebekah’s future?
items.answer-2: We have a lot of great things planned. First, serving the needs of millions of freelancers via our daily newsletter. We've also got some killer technology enabled products on the way that will take things to the next level.
items.the-gist: Really cool stuff that will rock your world.
items.name: What's the vision for Hey Rebekah’s future?

items.question: Can I see examples of other successful partnerships?
items.answer-2: Sure thing. Our Community Advocate will be glad to share specific examples with you. You may also check out our Archives anytime which include every newsletter we've written.
items.the-gist: Not to brag, but we have a long list.
items.name: Can I see examples of other successful partnerships?

items.question: Why is it called Hey Rebekah?
items.answer-2: Well, we had a bunch of folks asking us how we did this and how we did that. Enter Rebekah Radice, our co-founder and digital marketing genius. It just made sense to call it Hey Rebekah. Plus, she’s the only one who does her hair.
items.the-gist: Because Really Rebekah was too long of a domain name.
items.name: Why is it called Hey Rebekah?

items.question: Why did you create Hey Rebekah?
items.answer-2: Our team consists of senior freelance and long-time self-employed professionals. We've been working with clients since forever. We wanted to shift our focus to something with purpose. Where should we start? That was the million dollar question. It turned out the answer was right in front of us all along. We're on a mission to upskill the global workforce. Because knowledge should be free.
items.the-gist: We were bored and decided we wanted to do the kind of things that people would think we're crazy for.
items.name: Why did you create Hey Rebekah?

items.question: How do you pick content?
items.answer-2: Our editorial team prioritizes content production based on many factors. First and foremost, to address the needs and requests of our readers. We're building in the open so we share updates about that often. Of course we also chime in on current events relevant to our readers. If you have something you'd like us to write about, let us know.
items.the-gist: Machine learning FTW!
items.name: How do you pick content?

items.question: Will the newsletter always be free?
items.answer-2: All of the content we produce for our readers will always be free, period.
items.the-gist: The folks at BRIL.LA must be smoking the good stuff.
items.name: Will the newsletter always be free?

items.question: What information do you share with sponsors?
items.answer-2: We only share anonymized performance metrics. We never share personal information unless you have specifically opted-in to sharing it with them.
items.the-gist: We care about our readers' privacy.
items.name: What information do you share with sponsors?

items.question: What do you do with my email address?
items.answer-2: We take your privacy seriously. It's only used for its intended purpose, to give you access to our content or programs. We don't share it with anyone else, period. Check out our industry leading, privacy-focused privacy policy for more information.
items.the-gist: Nada, zip,zilch! We’re taking it to the grave.
items.name: What do you do with my email address?

items.question: Who is BRIL.LA, LLC.?
items.answer-2: BRIL.LA, LLC. is a woman and team owned business. BRIL.LA is the owner of the Hey Rebekah and the Rebekah Radice brands. Rebekah is the co-founder. When you pay us, you'll be cutting a check to BRIL.LA, LLC. for any sponsorships of our product/brand Hey Rebekah.
items.the-gist: It's the company behind the Hey Rebekah product/brand. The name you'll see on your invoice.
items.name: Who is BRIL.LA, LLC.?

items.answer-2: We're so glad you asked! You can see a list of our current Partnership Program companies here. If you've got something cool that our community would benefit from, we'd love to hear from you. We ask our partners to provide an exclusive, unpublished discount code for our readers instead of an affiliate commission for us. In return, we'll promote the heck out of your product across our community of over 300,000. No brainer, right?
items.question: Do you have a Partnership Program?
items.name: Do you have a partnership program?
items.the-gist: Yes and it's awesome.

items.question: What payment options do you have?
items.answer-2: Want to pay with your shiny corporate credit card or ACH? Go for it, we got you covered and it's secured by Stripe. Prefer the old fashioned way? No sweat, your account manager will hook you up with an invoice and you can just mail us a check. Just don't forget to give a shoutout to Angela in Accounting for us!
items.the-gist: We love 2023 but so many finance teams are in 1993.
items.name: What payment options do you have?

items.question: Can we pay you based on performance?
items.answer-2: We made the decision to say no to affiliate income programs because we wanted to give back to our community by offering discounts. It also helps us keep our readers' trust by keeping our editorial integrity intact. But, if we don't live up to your expectations, no worries! Just let us know and we'll give you a full refund, no questions asked, thanks to our 100% Delight Guarantee.
items.the-gist: We ask for skin in the game. You can opt for billing my invoice and if you're not happy for any reason, we'll void the invoice before you pay.
items.name: Can we pay you based on performance?

items.question: Why do you report your performance metrics publicly?
items.answer-2: Some folks might think we're crazy, but here's the thing: as a small team, we have to be efficient. By using technology, we can easily and transparently share our anonymized performance metrics with everyone. Plus, it's the right thing to do, because who wants to sit through 17 sales calls just to place a little ad? Not us, that's for sure.
items.the-gist: We're crazy and naive.
items.name: Why do you report your performance metrics publicly?

items.answer-2: We've made this as easy as pie for you. Once your sponsorship request gets the thumbs up, you'll be given access to your very own data room. You can check out all the anonymous campaign performance data you want, in real-time. No more mysteries or waiting. Plus, your trusty account manager will whip up some fancy reports and send them straight to your inbox.
items.question: How do I track campaign performance?
items.name: How do I track campaign performance?
items.the-gist: Industry leading transparent and accesible reports.

items.answer-2: Great question! Our creative team likes to take their sweet time crafting your one-of-a-kind masterpiece. Once you give us the green light, it goes straight to the top of our publishing queue. Your account manager will let you know the exact date... or at least they'll try to. Let's just say, we can't make any promises, but we'll do whatever we can to get it done. Especially if you have a target date in mind.
items.question: When will my campaign run?
items.name: When will my campaign run?
items.the-gist: First come first serve.

items.answer-2: Our dynamic, fixed-price, and crystal clear fees are based on a CPM of $75. But, as with any good recipe, there are a few key ingredients. The main ones being the number of newsletter subscribers who'll see your ad, the number of social followers who won't be able to resist clicking, and the number of times your ad will run across all channels. It depends on the package you choose.
items.question: How are your sponsorship fees calculated?
items.name: How are your sponsorship fees calculated?
items.the-gist: Dynamic and transparent pricing.

items.answer-2: There's nothing more important to us than your complete satisfaction. So if you're unhappy with your investment for any reason, no problem! Just let us know and we'll issue a full refund, no questions asked. Whenever. Forever. Period.
items.question: 100% Delight Guarantee
items.name: 100% Delight Guarantee
items.the-gist: Our unconditional refund policy means their's no risk.

items.question: I'm not getting the newsletter, what's up?
items.answer-2: Yikes! We’re so sorry about that. Please search your mailbox for “Hey Rebekah”. You may have received the email but it’s gone to the dreaded Promotions tab or even worse, spam. Please give us some love and add us to your contacts and safe senders list.
items.the-gist: Email deliverability is a hard thing to master.
items.name: I'm not getting the newsletter, what's up?

items.question: How is creative handled?
items.answer-2: Our creative squad will team up with you or your brand manager to craft the perfect sponsorship experience. We'll handle all the boring stuff like copywriting and graphics, then send it over for your stamp of approval. Once you're head over heels in love with it, we'll drop it into the publishing queue. Easy peasy.
items.the-gist: Our superstar creative team has your back.
items.name: How is creative handled?

items.answer-2: All of our newsletter posts are available in our Archives. Anyone can access them online anytime without a gate. For our full range of content, please subscribe to the newsletter.
items.question: Where can I find old editions of Hey Rebekah?
items.name: Where can I find old editions of Hey Rebekah?
items.the-gist: ICYMI, the folks at Hey Rebekah are organized.

items.question: Can I change the time your newsletters get sent?
items.answer-2: As of today, that's not possible. Sorry! We're working on a solution and will share an update soon.
items.the-gist: Hey Rebekah is so 2009, not for long though.
items.name: Can I change the time your newsletters get sent?

items.question: Where can I submit feedback for the editorial team?
items.answer-2: We would love to hear from you. Please reply to any of our emails- we read every one or send us an email.
items.the-gist: We thrive on critical feedback. Drop us a line and #RoastUs.
items.name: Where can I submit feedback for the editorial team?

items.question: Do you have a referral program?
items.answer-2: You bet we do! Once you subscribe to the newsletter you'll be automatically added to the queue to receive an invite. You'll need to be an engaged/frequent reader to receive the invitation to our referral program. It's pretty sweet. We have some cool gifts but most readers love the exclusive access to the Hey Rebekah Community on Circle.
items.the-gist: Oh great, more stickers. Wait a minute, did she say exclusive access to the Hey Rebekah team?
items.name: Do you have a referral program?

items.question: How do I subscribe to your newsletter?
items.answer-2: By entering your email into any one the subscribe widgets throughout this site. There's one at the top of the home page.
items.the-gist: Really? OK, just click one of 7 big pink buttons that say Subscribe or Get It, peppered throughout this page.
items.name: How do I subscribe to your newsletter?

items.question: I need a job, you hiring?
items.answer-2: Of course, we're recruiting wicked smaaght people to teach us a thing or two about writing, coding, and editing. If you're up to it, you can check available job openings here.
items.the-gist: You're crazy but I'm sure it'll be alright.
items.name: I need a job, you hiring?

items.question: How do you make money?
items.answer-2: Like a boss baby! 🎤 Actually, we don't, for now. We're building an incredible resource for the freelance community. We'll figure out monetization later. It'll probably come in the form of sponsorships and curated ads within our publication. We don't make money from affiliate links.
items.the-gist: Ambreen, Rebekah, and Sam are optimistic nut jobs who think they can change the world.
items.name: How do you make money?

items.answer-2: We thought you'd never ask! ☺️ In fact, there's no better time than the present because we're pre-launch and have no idea if this will even work. So you've got all the leverage. You can reach out to our sponsorship team to get started.
items.question: How can I sponsor your newsletter?
items.name: How can I sponsor your newsletter?
items.the-gist: Sponsorship team? LOL. Send Rebekah's husband an email and we'll hook you up.

items.answer-2:
Hey Rebekah is a free daily newsletter that will help you become better at what you do in six minutes every morning. Think of it like Morning Brew for freelancers, without all the readers.

We're going to be launching playbooks, courses, apps, and live events to help freelancers build thriving careers, make more money, and find their joy. Everything we produce for our readers will always be free.
items.question: What's Hey Rebekah?
items.name: What's Hey Rebekah?
items.the-gist: What she said.

items.question: Tell me more about yourself
items.name: Tell me more about yourself
items.the-gist: Rebekah's a dorky influencer type with a happy family, cute dogs, bad taste in sports teams, and brilliant colleagues.
items.answer-2:
People say I'm a digital marketing expert. I've been self-employed since 1998. I'm from sunny southern California. I adore my two boys and their partners.

I'm a grandma! My husband is my best friend. We love going for long rides on our bikes and spending time at the beach. We cheer for the Steelers and the Cubs to win. I enjoy traveling and super spicy foods.
